alert.note: Alert for Callahan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 10 at 2:16PM CST until January 12 at 12:00AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST WEDNESDAY NIGHT FOR LOW HUMIDITY LEVELS AND STRONG WINDS FOR THE BIG COUNTRY AND PARTS OF THE CONCHO VALLEY AND NORTHERN EDWARDS PLATEAU... The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a Red Flag Warning for low humidity levels and strong winds, which is in effect from noon Wednesday to midnight CST Wednesday night. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WINDS...West to southwest winds from 15 to 25 mph, with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...near 15 percent. * FUELS...Dry * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly in these conditions. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will occur shortly. A combination of strong winds, low humidity and dry fuels will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
